import React from 'react'; import './aboutus.scss'; import main from '../images/main.jpg'; // Gambar tentang restoran kamu function AboutUs() { return (

About Us

Welcome to Restoran Lezat

At Restoran Lezat, we believe in offering the most delightful dining experience. Established in [Year], our restaurant has been serving delicious and fresh meals made from the highest quality ingredients. Our mission is to bring people together with great food and exceptional service.

Our Story

The journey of Restoran Lezat began with a passion for food and a dream to create a place where people can enjoy a memorable meal with family and friends. Over the years, we have grown and evolved, but our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction remains our top priority.

Our Values

  • Quality: We use only the freshest ingredients in all our dishes.
  • Hospitality: Our team is dedicated to providing a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
  • Community: We strive to support local producers and contribute to our community.
); } export default AboutUs;
